edu.uprb.company

Class SalesEmployee

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uprb.company.Employee
      • edu.uprb.company.SalesEmployee

  • public class SalesEmployee
extends Employee
    Represents a record of a company's sales Employee.
    Author:
    Luis J. Berríos Negrón

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SalesEmployee(int employeeId)
      Construct a sales employee record with the specified employee ID.
      SalesEmployee(int employeeId, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, Department department, double salesAmount, double commissionRate)
      Construct a sales employee record with the specified employee ID, first name, last name, company Department, sales amount, and commission rate.
